tasks.taskDesc: Design a new website for KodeCamp, taking into consideration the fact that it is an e-learning platform but should also be marketable to sponsors or partners. Deliverables: User research plan Personas User stories Information architecture User low Wireframes High-fidelity designs Clickable prototype Note: You’re to design all pages, not just the home page. Use the websites below as source of inspiration.
